FULL TITLE : SUCCESSFUL STAGING OF THE PROCESSION OF OUR LADY OF PENAFRANCIA IN NAGA CITY DESPITE THE THREAT OF TERRORISM
SHORT TITLE : Threat Of Terrorism During The Penafrancia Festival In Naga
ABSTRACT : Describing to the Body ... the street procession in honor of the Our Lady of Peñafrancia ... and dubbed in his region as the festival of festivals due to its sheer breadth and historicity, Rep. Bordado disclosed how this year’s Marian festival had to contend with the shadow of terrorism. He thereafter cited a PNP intelligence report that a member of the Abu Sayyaf Group was in Naga City, but that the Joint Operations Center led by the City Government of Naga and the Archdiocese of Caceres, together with the AFP, the PNP as well as other concerned government and NGOs had reassured the public that everything was under control and that proactive steps were being taken to address the threat of terrorism. Thus, the nineday Peñafrancia festivities successfully proceeded without any terroristic act, he added. He expressed belief that the Joint Operations Center was worth replicating in other areas of the country and said that with the outpouring of faith, hope and love, the Peñafrancia festival will always be a source of strength and inspiration for people in quest of peace for a strife-torn world. (SOURCE: House Journal No.24,p.10)
